title: Frame.ContentTransitions no longer working for pages in Build 17763
body: We have discovered a major breaking change in Windows SDK Build 17763 for UWP apps upgrading from a previous version.

comments.body: Thank you for reporting this issue. This is indeed an unexpected consequence of adding a default theme transition when navigating between pages. We are tracking this bug internally, but in the meantime, please leverage the workaround mentioned (ie. "Frame.Navigate(typeof(AnyPage), parameter, new DrillInNavigationTransitionInfo());")
